items.title: Tracking Lone Pine Capital Portfolio - Q4 2024 Update
items.description: Lone Pine Capital's 13F portfolio value increased slightly from $13.41B to $13.47B. Check out the new stakes and significant stake additions to the portfolio.

items.title: Salesforce (NYSE:CRM) Expands AI Capabilities With Deloitte Partnership, Shares Up 2%
items.description: Deloitte and Salesforce (NYSE:CRM) have recently strengthened their strategic partnership to deliver innovative AI-driven solutions, which has positioned Salesforce to enhance its market presence significantly. This collaboration aligns with the broader market trends where mega-cap tech stocks are rising amidst a rebound rally, as seen in the slight gains of the S&P 500 and Nasdaq. Moreover, the integration of Salesforce’s Agentforce into Maximus's Total Experience Management solution...
